PageTitle: clock source synchronization (virtual access ap-id view)
FuncDef:
The clock source synchronization enable command enables clock synchronization for a clock source.
The undo clock source synchronization enable command disables clock synchronization for a clock source.
By default, clock source synchronization is disabled for a clock source.
CLIs: clock source bits0 synchronization enable [ slot <slotid> ]
undo clock source bits0 synchronization enable [ slot <slotid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of the main control board which the clock is installed.
Only the master and slave main control boards that can exchange BITS signals support the configurations of the slot slot-id keyword and parameter.
The value is a string of 1 to 16 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a device to communicate with a BITS device or a router by using an external clock interface to send and receive clock frequency information, run the clock source synchronization enable command to enable clock synchronization on the external clock interface.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
